2084.subject: BUS
2084.descrlong: Focuses on the creation and development of innovative products that solve the problems of society in a legal and ethical manner.  Also, the necessary characteristics of businesses and markets associated with the success of such products. Develops effective personal skills and effective management and marketing competence. Investigates attributes of product success by scrutinizing the entire process of product creation, development, and launch. (Offered as interest warrants.)
